level.text: 565.1 The Director shall collect the following fees from applicants for certification as basic life support providers (Emergency Medical Responders and Emergency Medical Technicians) and for provisional and replacement cards:
Application fee (initial and renewal) – $15;
Initial certification fee – $30;
Renewal of certification fee – $30;
Provisional cards – $10;
Replacement cards – $10; and
Out of State processing fee – Application fee plus ten dollars ($10).
565.2 The initial certification fee under § 565.1 shall be prorated based on the length of initial certification as follows:
One (1) to ninety (90) days – $3.75;
Ninety-one (91) to one hundred eighty (180) days – $7.50;
One hundred eighty-one (181) to two hundred seventy (270) days – $11.25;
Two hundred seventy-one (271) to three hundred sixty-five (365) days – $15;
Three hundred sixty-six (366) to four hundred fifty-five (455) days – $18.75;
Four hundred fifty-six (456) to five hundred forty-five (545) days – $22.50;
Five hundred forty-six (546) to six hundred thirty-five (635) days – $26.25; and
Six hundred thirty-six (636) to seven hundred thirty (730) days – $30.

The Director shall collect the following fees from applicants for certification as advanced life support providers (Advanced Emergency Medical Technicians, Emergency Medical Technician-Intermediates, and Paramedics) and for provisional and replacement cards:
Application fee – $25;
Initial certification fee – $50;
Renewal of certification fee – $30;
Provisional cards – $10;
Replacement cards – $10; and
Out of State processing fee – Application fee plus ten dollars ($10).
Certification fee shall be prorated based on the length of initial certification as follows:
One (1) to ninety (90) days – $6.25;
Ninety-one (91) to one hundred eighty (180) days – $12.50;
One hundred eighty-one (181) to two hundred seventy (270) days – $18.75
Two hundred seventy-one (271) to three hundred sixty-five (365) days – $25;
Three hundred sixty-six (366) to four hundred fifty-five (455) days – $31.25;
Four hundred fifty-six (456) to five hundred forty-five (545) days – $37.50;
Five hundred forty-six (546) to six hundred thirty-five (635) days – $43.75; and
Six hundred thirty-six (636) to seven hundred thirty (730) days – $50.
The Director shall collect the following fees for inspecting and certifying ambulances, including Basic Life Support ambulances and Advanced Life Support ambulances:
Advanced Life Support ambulances – $600;
Basic Life Support ambulances – $400; and
Follow-up inspections of ambulances following a failed inspection – $50.
565.6 The Director shall collect the following fees for certifying Emergency Medical Service instructors:
Application fee – $5;
Initial certification fee – $15; and
Renewal of certification fee – $15.
565.7 The Director shall collect the following fees for certifying emergency medical services educational institutions:
Application fee – $100;
Initial certification fee – $150; and
Renewal of certification fee – $200.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 16569 (December 6, 2013).
